origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicAPI.analyze_policy_effect', 'description': 'This function analyzes the effect of a specific policy on a targeted economic sector, focusing on financing impacts.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyArea', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The area of policy to analyze, e.g., financial_support, trade_regulations.'}, {'name': 'targetSector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The economic sector to analyze the policy effect on, e.g., culture, manufacturing.'}, {'name': 'analysisType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to perform, e.g., impact_on_financing, employment_trends.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'description': 'The results of the policy effect analysis on the specified economic sector.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicAPI.analyze_policy_effect, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyArea'是'financial_support', 'targetSector'是'culture', 'analysisType'是'impact_on_financing'.
